name: Catch A Fairy
description:
CONTROLS

ENTER - Throw the tongue
MLB (Mouse Left Button) - To click on the buttons

NOTES

The mobile version iOS and Android (both FREE), does have all features working: 
Leaderboard
Progress Saving: Gold / Score / Skins / Tongues

GAME DESCRIPTION

Time the frog`s jumps to hit fairies and keep the bar filled. Trust your instincts and you`ll find the perfect rhythm to catch a fairy with every jump. Chain multiple fairy hits without missing to raise your score to greater heights.

Personalize your frog by selecting a costume and tongue that suits your playstyle. Unlock more skins and tongues by earning coins by completing games. Earn more coins by scoring higher so reaching bonus levels is always plus. Bonus levels will always appear after the 10th level to cap off a successful cycle. 


FEATURES

1 jumping frog
10 levels
10 fairy behaviors
21 skins
6 tongue types
Bonus level that caps each cycle
A lot of hungry
